title: Baker's Dough
description: Robots have a tough life in Hal Spacejock's universe: as second-class citizens they have no rights, and most are overworked, mistreated, and recycled at the drop of a hat.When Kim Baker, a wealthy industrialist, leaves his vast fortune to an elderly robot, it's front page news.Unfortunately, the robot hasn't been seen for decades ...
author: Simon Haynes
